import{useState}from"react";import"./App.css";import Header from"./components/Header";import Section from"./components/Section";import Skills from"./components/Skills";import Projects from"./components/Projects";import Contact from"./components/Contact";import Footer from"./components/Footer";// Import Material UI components
import{Button,TextField}from"@mui/material";import{ThemeProvider,createTheme}from"@mui/material/styles";import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";function App(){// Add state for dark mode
const[darkMode,setDarkMode]=useState(false);// Add state for a new skill
const[newSkill,setNewSkill]=useState("");const[skills,setSkills]=useState(["HTML5 & CSS3","JavaScript","React","Node.js","UI/UX Design"]);// Create a theme based on dark mode state
const theme=createTheme({palette:{mode:darkMode?"dark":"light"}});// Event handler to add a new skill
const handleAddSkill=()=>{if(newSkill.trim()!==""){setSkills([...skills,newSkill]);setNewSkill("");}};const projects=[{id:1,title:"Weather App",description:"A responsive weather application built with HTML, CSS, and JavaScript.",link:"https://github.com"},{id:2,title:"Portfolio Website",description:"This website, built using React and modern web technologies.",link:"https://github.com"}];return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(ThemeProvider,{theme:theme,children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{id:"main-content",className:`App ${darkMode?"dark-mode":""}`,children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Header,{name:"Jack Greenberg",title:"Texas ECE Student",imageUrl:"/profile.jpg",darkMode:darkMode,toggleDarkMode:()=>setDarkMode(!darkMode)}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs(Section,{title:"About Me",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{children:"Hello! I'm a passionate web developer and designer currently studying ECE. I love creating beautiful, functional websites and applications that solve real-world problems."}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{children:"When I'm not coding, you can find me hiking, reading science fiction, or experimenting with new recipes."})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Skills,{skills:skills}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"add-skill-section",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Section,{title:"Add a Skill",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"skill-form",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(TextField,{label:"New Skill",variant:"outlined",value:newSkill,onChange:e=>setNewSkill(e.target.value),size:"small",style:{marginRight:"10px"}}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Button,{variant:"contained",color:"primary",onClick:handleAddSkill,children:"Add Skill"})]})})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Projects,{projects:projects}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Contact,{email:"jack@example.com",socialLinks:[{name:"GitHub",url:"https://github.com"},{name:"LinkedIn",url:"https://linkedin.com"},{name:"Twitter",url:"https://twitter.com"}]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Footer,{})]})});}export default App;
